mapper.select: SELECT user_no as userNo, user_id as userId, user_name as userName, password, email, phone_num as phoneNum, join_date as joinDate FROM user ORDER BY user_no DESC
SELECT user_no as userNo, user_id as userId, user_name as userName, password, email, phone_num as phoneNum, join_date as joinDate FROM user WHERE user_no = #{no}
SELECT user_no as userNo, user_id as userId, user_name as userName, password, email, phone_num as phoneNum, join_date as joinDate FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND password = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( user_id, user_name, password, email, phone_num ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phoneNum} )
